OrgName.entry: NORTH YORKSHIRE MOORS HISTORICAL RAILWAY TRUST, SOUTH YORKSHIRE AREA GROUP

Desc.entry: Local branch of the Trust which aims to arrange meetings and outings for people interested in the preservation of the North Yorkshire Moors Railway. Meetings open to non-members.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 3rd Tues in the month at 7.15pm (except Aug)
